p: Under each RCP scenario, vulnerable regions expanded toward northern parts of Europe, Asia, and North America up till the 2070s ( Fig 5 and S3 Fig). Pinus distribution areas in Portugal and Spain, two countries in Europe affected, were categorized as vulnerable under each of the four RCP scenarios. Under RCP 8.5, vulnerable regions expanded considerably in northern Asia compared with RCPs 2.6, 4.5, and 6.0. In East Asia, the spatial extent of vulnerable regions did not differ considerably among the four RCPs, except in far-east Russia. In North America, even the northern region of the Pinus distribution areas was categorized as vulnerable under RCP 8.5.
